summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.3°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 7300 lux) and cloud levels (up 308 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12782 lux), cloud levels (up 1888 m), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 308.3m lower than yesterday, 802.3m lower than the past week, 1888.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 758.7m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1561.0m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Light to moderate rain is forecast, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
